thread.section_title: Enchanting Travels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Enchanting Travels | enchantingtravels.com
thread.title: Ashley

author: Ashley
title: Ashley
text: Enchanting Travels provided an unforgettable honeymoon vacation & experience for us! From the very beginning, our Trip Coordinator and Planner were thorough, helpful, and inquisitive to ensure they planned a perfect itinerary. They were always quick to answer our many questions that arose before the trip and were there every leg of the way. They put us in touch with the most wonderful places/lodges/camps in East Africa that we would never have found ourselves. They were thoughtful in providing lunches throughout (even while travelling or connecting to other destinations) and we knew we were in good hands every step of the way. Their follow-up after the trip has been just as on-point, and we recommend them fully!
